socorro_links.comment_text:
E.g. Firefox for Android v144.0.x had ~760 crash reports from ~570 installs. Crash reports continue with Firefox for Android 145. This is not segment by crash stack. Only Android API 30-36 is affected.

Crash report: https://crash-stats.mozilla.org/report/index/c96cc944-9ffc-4ab5-89ec-102350251113

MOZ_CRASH Reason:
```
MOZ_CRASH(JNI exception)
```

Top 10 frames:
```
0  libxul.so  MOZ_CrashSequence(void*, long)  mfbt/Assertions.h:242
0  libxul.so  mozilla::jni::Accessor::EndAccess<mozilla::java::CodecProxy::ReleaseOutput_t>...  widget/android/jni/Accessors.h:61
0  libxul.so  mozilla::jni::Method<mozilla::java::CodecProxy::ReleaseOutput_t, bool>::EndAc...  widget/android/jni/Accessors.h:99
0  libxul.so  mozilla::jni::Method<mozilla::java::CodecProxy::ReleaseOutput_t, bool>::Call<...  widget/android/jni/Accessors.h:117
1  libxul.so  mozilla::java::CodecProxy::ReleaseOutput(mozilla::jni::Ref<mozilla::jni::Obje...  widget/android/GeneratedJNI/CodecProxyWrappers.cpp:94
2  libxul.so  mozilla::RenderOrReleaseOutput::ReleaseOutput(bool)  dom/media/platforms/android/RemoteDataDecoder.cpp:59
3  libxul.so  mozilla::RenderOrReleaseOutput::~RenderOrReleaseOutput()  dom/media/platforms/android/RemoteDataDecoder.cpp:54
4  libxul.so  mozilla::RemoteVideoDecoder::CompositeListener::~CompositeListener()  dom/media/platforms/android/RemoteDataDecoder.cpp:95
4  libxul.so  mozilla::RemoteVideoDecoder::CompositeListener::~CompositeListener()  dom/media/platforms/android/RemoteDataDecoder.cpp:95
4  libxul.so  {virtual override thunk({offset(-24)}, mozilla::RemoteVideoDecoder::Composite...  dom/media/platforms/android/RemoteDataDecoder.cpp:0
```
